page.title: 18LOCAL GHOSTS
page.content: {The area we have charted in our {Domesday Project Survey does not seem {very rich in local taditions and {customs. However it does offer some {interesting ghost stories.See what you {make of these. { We were told by the Plowman-Render {family of Back Lane that a strange {figure comes out on Nee Year's Eve on {the Raskelf Road each year. He points {three times at the ground and then {disappears.Some folk think he was the {victim of three murderers of the last {century and is now showing where they {have gone! { A couple of years ago Mrs Ann Wray's {husband felt a cold wind as he lay in {bed.He looked into the corner of the {bedroom and saw his old next-door {neighbour doing a pirouette.Yet she {had been dead a year and her death had {happened a year before to the day!
